summary: This document details a police investigation into a burglary case assigned to the 19th precinct. The report includes information about the complainant, Yossi Salon, and the property manager, Richard Barnett, who provided access to surveillance footage from the location of the incident. The footage did not capture any suspects.

persons.name: Yossi Salon
persons.context: Yossi Salon is the complainant in the burglary case, indicating that he is the victim of the crime.

persons.name: Richard Barnett
persons.context: Richard Barnett is the property manager for 9 East 71 Street, who allowed the police to review the surveillance video.

connections.description: Yossi Salon is a tenant or user of the property managed by Richard Barnett.

events.title: Burglary Investigation
events.description: Police met with Richard Barnett to review surveillance footage related to the burglary case involving Yossi Salon.

keyFacts: The investigation pertains to a burglary case reported by Yossi Salon.
Richard Barnett, the property manager, provided access to surveillance footage.
The surveillance cameras at the property did not capture any suspects.
The case remains active as of the report date.
